display_long_description:
Dizmo Tag is a high-energy, multiplayer VR tag game where speed, skill, and creativity collide. Jump into the body of a nimble, parkour-powered ape and dive into dynamic maps packed with obstacles, vertical paths, and endless movement possibilities. Whether you're sprinting across rooftops, wall-running over lava pits, or swinging through trees in a jungle biome, Dizmo Tag turns every chase into an adrenaline-pumping experience.

Designed for both casual fun and competitive play, Dizmo Tag offers a range of game modes including classic tag, infection, freeze tag, and more. Play with friends or meet new rivals in public lobbies as you climb the global leaderboards and prove you’ve got the fastest hands and feet in VR. With responsive physics-based movement, smooth locomotion, and no artificial movement restrictions, you're in full control—run, jump, climb, and slide your way to victory.

Unlock a wide variety of cosmetics, hats, trails, and skins to personalize your ape and stand out in the crowd. The game features frequent updates, seasonal events, and community-driven content that keep the gameplay fresh and exciting. Whether you're a seasoned VR player or just getting started, Dizmo Tag offers something for everyone who loves movement-focused fun.

So gear up, jump in, and show the world your tag game is unmatched. In Dizmo Tag, it's not just about running—it's about outsmarting, outmaneuvering, and outplaying the competition.
